name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Site Reliability Engineer with 13+ years of hands-on experience in developing robust, high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **AWS**, **Python**, and **Terraform**, with a strong focus on **DevOps** practices and methodologies. Skilled in implementing **observability** solutions utilizing tools such as **OpenTelemetry**, **Cloudwatch**, and **DataDog** to enhance system monitoring and performance.
Demonstrated expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics and real-time processing, aligning with industry standards in compliance-driven development such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Extensive experience in deploying cloud-native systems and managing CI/CD pipelines, ensuring efficient delivery and reliability of applications. Well-versed in the principles of MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
